translations: （Garret）人名；（英）加勒特；（法）加雷；（西、葡）加雷特

sentences.sentence: Up in the little garret there stands, half-dressed, a little Dancer.
sentences.translation: 小阁楼里站着一个半裸的小舞蹈家。

sentences.sentence: So now the garret-dwellers have no excuses.
sentences.translation: 所以那些居住阁楼的落魄艺术家，再也没有借口了。

sentences.sentence: A broad open space was cleared in the middle of the garret.
sentences.translation: 破屋子的中间顿时空了一大片。
